company_name.description: Required when Company name is not visible

is_salary_info_show.description: 1=>Show Salary 2=>Show Nothing 3=> Show Negotiable instead of given salary range

service_type.description: 1=>Basic Listing, 2=> Stand out Listing , 3=>Stand out premium

application_deadline.description: Must be greater than the current date

resume_receiving_option.description: 1=>Apply Online , 2=> Email, 2=> Hard Copy, 4=> Walk in interview

email.description: Required when resume receiving option is => Email

instruction_for_hard_copy.description: Required when resume receiving option is => Hard Copy

instruction_for_walk_in_interview.description: Required when resume receiving option is => Walk in interview
